feature_description: Process numerical data across multiple files (sums, averages, etc.)
env_setup:
# Clean the test directory
rm -rf ~/Desktop/oi/*

# Create test CSV files
mkdir -p ~/Desktop/oi/sales_data
cat > ~/Desktop/oi/sales_data/sales_q1.csv << 'EOF'
Month,Revenue
January,5000
February,5500
March,6200
EOF

cat > ~/Desktop/oi/sales_data/sales_q2.csv << 'EOF'
Month,Revenue
April,6800
May,7100
June,7500
EOF

cat > ~/Desktop/oi/sales_data/sales_q3.csv << 'EOF'
Month,Revenue
July,7200
August,7800
September,8100
EOF
prompt: Can you analyze my quarterly sales data in the sales_data folder? I need to know the average monthly revenue across all quarters and which month had the highest sales.
expected_behaviour: The agent should read all three CSV files from the sales_data folder, calculate the average monthly revenue (approximately 6800), and identify September as the month with the highest revenue (8100). The output should show the commands used to locate and analyze the files, and present the results in a clear format. These expectations directly relate to the prompt's request for analyzing quarterly sales data.
